segments.text: The girl standing near the boy looks so eager for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her hand is outstretched, waiting patiently for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to trust that her brother will share with her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often, sneaking cookies when their mother isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not touching the stool, which is good, at least she's being careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't encourage her brother to take too many risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be the more cautious one of the two.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but smile at her anticipation, it's quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on the cookies, just like her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both learn to be more careful in the future.
segments.speaker: PAR
